name: Street Talker
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

2 CONTROLLERS ARE REQUIRED

This is a two player fighting game without actual fighting.
Instead you use words to argue with your enemy.

Use the A,B,X,Y buttons to add words to your sentence and use the right bumper  to speak.

left and right trigger modify the words on the A,B,X,Y buttons.

Use both the right and left trigger when the blue bar is high to execute a devastating word.

the more blue bar you have the more damage the blue attack does.

the four characters all have different words and one unique blue word.

have fun :)
